member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddIn
member.summary: Represents a manifest file for an Excel add-in.
member.remarks: The latest version of this file should be stored on a remote and the should point it. Based on the , a copy of this file will be downloded onto to the client.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddIn.Uri
member.summary: Specifies the Uri of the add-in file.
member.remarks:
This is used locate the add-in file. Supported file extentions include .xlam, .xla, .xll, or .dll. Note, if .dll, then the must be either or . The client must have admin rights so that the assembly can be programatically registered for COM interop.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddIn.DeploymentUri
member.summary: Specifies the Uri of the associated .
member.remarks:
This is used locate the depoyment manifest on the remote so that it can be de-serialized.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddIn.Identity
member.summary: Identifies the version of the application to install, and the location of the add-in manifest.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddIn.Dependencies
member.summary: Identifies assembly(s) on which the add-in depends.
member.remarks:
If the == , and it is being deployed as un-packed, then there must be one or more (s) included. The same is true for add-ins of type that reference an external assembly(s).
Xml Node Type: Array
Xml Required: N

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddIn.AssetFiles
member.summary: Identifies nonassembly file(s) to be downloaded and used by the add-in.
member.remarks:
If the == , and it is being deployed as un-packed, then the .dna file must be included as an .
Xml Node Type: Array
Xml Required: N

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddIn.DigitalSignature
member.summary: Specifies a Digital Signature that can be used to verify the authenticity of the add-in Manifest.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: N

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInIdentity
member.summary: Represents information that identifies an Excel add-in.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInIdentity.AddInType
member.summary: Identifies the type of Excel Add-in.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: N

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInIdentity.Title
member.summary: Identifies the title of the application.
member.remarks:
This is used by com interop methods to index the Microsoft.Office.Interop.Addins collection.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInIdentity.Name
member.summary: Identifies the human-readable name of the application.
member.remarks:
Cannot contain non-alpha-numeric characters.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInIdentity.FileExtension
member.summary: Identifies the file extension of the application.
member.remarks:
Cannot contain non-alpha-numeric characters.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInIdentity.Version
member.summary: Specifies the version number of the add-in.
member.remarks:
To trigger an application update, this value must be incremented in an updated manifest.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInType
member.summary: Types of Excel add-ins that can be created.

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInType.Vba
member.summary: An .xla or .xlam file that contains functions/procedures (written in VBA) to extend Excel's functionality.

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInType.ExcelDna
member.summary: An .xll file (written in .Net) using the Excel-DNA project/library.

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInType.Automation
member.summary: An assembly (.dll) that exposes .Net functions to Excel as UDFs.
member.remarks:
This type does NOT interact with Excel Objects (via COM interop) by default. These functions should be visible in the excel function wizard.
See:

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInType.Com
member.summary: An assembly (.dll) that uses COM interop to in (using .Net) to interact with the Excel Application.
member.remarks:
This type is typically used to automate Excel in response to events such as the click of a CommandBar button, a form/dialog box, or other. The functions within a COM Add-in cannot be called from cell formulas in worksheets.
See:

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInFileExtensionType
member.summary: File extensions available for Excel add-ins.

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInFileExtensionType.Xlam
member.summary: A .xlam file must be of type .

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInFileExtensionType.Xla
member.summary: A .xla file must be of type .

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInFileExtensionType.Xll
member.summary: A .xll file can be any type except .

member.name: F:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AddInFileExtensionType.Dll
member.summary: A .dll file must be of type or .

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssemblyIdentity
member.summary: Describes the identity of an assembly.
member.remarks: All assemblies must target the .Net Framework. Valid ProcessorArchitecture values will be will be MSIL, X86, or IA64. The file extension should always be .dll.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssemblyIdentity.Name
member.summary: Identifies the human-readable name of the assembly.
member.remarks:
Cannot contain non-alpha-numeric characters.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssemblyIdentity.Version
member.summary: Specifies the version number of the assembly.
member.remarks:
This value must be incremented in an updated manifest to trigger an application update.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssemblyIdentity.PublicKey
member.summary: Specifies a 16-character hexadecimal string that represents the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash value of the public key under which the deployment manifest is signed.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: N

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssemblyIdentity.ProcessorArchitecture
member.summary: Identifies the processor and bits-per-word of the platform targeted by an executable
member.remarks:
Specifies the processor. Valid values are MSIL (neutral with respect to processor and bits per word), X86 for 32-bit Windows, IA64 for 64-bit Windows. The value of this property must match that of the assembly being deployed. See
for more information.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: N

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssemblyIdentity.Culture
member.summary: The name of the culture to associate with the assembly.
member.remarks:
Specify null, Empty, or "neutral" (any casing) to represent InvariantCulture. The name can be an arbitrary string that doesn't contain NUL character, the legality of the culture name is not validated.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: N

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssemblyIdentity.Hash
member.summary: Represents a cryptographic hash that can be used to verify the authenticity of an assembly.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: N

member.summary: Indicated if the file is a zipped file that it should be decompressed.
member.remarks:
If true, the file unzipped when downloaded.
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: N

member.summary: Represents the physical file location on the client machine to which this file is deployed.

Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.AssetFile.Hash
member.summary: Represents a cryptographic hash that can be used to verify the authenticity of an the file.
member.remarks:

Xml Required: N

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UnitOfTime
member.summary: Represents an interval of time.

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.MicrosoftOfficeBitness
member.summary: Represents the bits-per-word (i.e. "Bitness", either 32 or 64) of the installation of Microsoft Office targeted by the add-in.
member.remarks: Note that 64 bit operating systems are compatible with 32 bit installations of Microsoft Office.

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.OperatingSystemBitness
member.summary: Represents the bits-per-word (i.e. "Bitness", either 32 or 64) of the platform targeted by an assembly.
member.remarks: For unmanaged assemblies that do not target the .Net framework, or are native (e.g. written C, assembler, or similar), should be used.

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.NetClrVersion
member.summary: Represents all .Net Framework CLR versions published and deployed by Microsoft.

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.Deployment
member.summary: Represents a manifest file that contains information required to deploy updates to an Excel add-in from a remote to a client.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.Deployment.AddInUri
member.summary: Specifies the Uri of the associated .
member.remarks:
This is used to locate and de-serialize the manifest file on the remote . If the manifest has been updated to reflect a new Version of an add-in, the (s) defined in the (s) and (s) are used to locate the files so they can be downloaded onto the client. Once the update is complete, the manifest is saved to the client machine, effectively completing an update cycle.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.Deployment.TargetOfficeInstallation
member.summary: Specifies the "Bitness" (either 32 or 64) of the installation of Microsoft Office on which the add-in can run.
member.remarks:
The physical add-in file must be compatible with this value. Note that 64 bit operating systems are compatible with 32 bit installations of Microsoft Office.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: Y

Xml Required: Y

member.summary: Represents the locations of all 's.

member.summary: Represents the locations of one or more 's.

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.DeploymentSettings
member.summary: Identifies the attributes used for the deployment of updates and exposure to the system.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.DeploymentSettings.DeploymentBasis
member.summary: Indicates the basis ( or ) for the deployment.
member.remarks:
This is used to determined the pararent directory (on the client) to which the application is deployed. Admin privileges are required for deployment.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.DeploymentSettings.MinimumRequiredVersion
member.summary: Specifies the minimum version of the application that can run on the client.
member.remarks:
the default version check on the client. If If the minimum version number of the application (located on the client) is less than the version number supplied in the deployment manifest, the application will not run. Otherwise Version numbers must be specified in the format major.minor.build.revision, where each (decimal separated) number is an unsigned integer.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.DeploymentSettings.MapFileExtensions
member.summary: Specifies that all files in the manifest associated with a must have a .xlautodeploy file extension.
member.remarks:
The extension allows all the files within a deployment to be downloaded from a Web server that blocks transmission of files ending in "unsafe" extensions such as .exe. This extension will be stripped off of the files Uri(s) as soon as they are downloaded them from the Web server.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.DeploymentSettings.LoadBehavior
member.summary: Controls how the application is loaded on a client machine.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: Y

member.summary: Controls how updates are processed on a client machine.

Xml Required: Y

member.summary: Represents the physical file location on client machine to which supporting files (i.e. (s) and (s)) are deployed.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.FilePlacement.NextToAddIn
member.summary: Specifies whether this file is placed next to the add-in when downloaded on the client.
member.remarks:
This is particularly useful .dna for xll's deployed as un-packed. The dna file can redirect to sub-directory(s) that contains another .dna file. This secondary dna file should point to the (s) and (s) in said sub-directory. See for more information.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.FilePlacement.SubDirectory
member.summary: The name or path of the SubDirectory to which this file belongs.
member.remarks:
If is true, then this value will be ignored. This would be the sub-directory in which the file would downloaded on the client if the add-in redirects it references.
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: N

member.summary: Specifies a support URL for the dependent platform.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.RequiredOperatingSystem.PlatformId
member.summary: Gets the enumeration value that identifies the platform of the target OS.
member.remarks: The value of this property will always be because this application or (any that it loads/installs) must target the Windows OS.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.RequiredOperatingSystem.PlatformName
member.summary: Gets common name of the target OS.
member.remarks: The value of this property will always be Windows because this application or (any that it loads/installs) must target the Windows OS.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.RequiredOperatingSystem.Version
member.summary: Specifies the version of the target OS.
member.remarks:
If the OS version number of the application (located on the client) is less than the version number supplied in the deployment manifest, the application will not run. Version numbers must be specified in the format major.minor.build.revision, where each (decimal separated) number is an unsigned integer.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.RequiredOperatingSystem.Bitness
member.summary: Specifies the "Bitness" (either 32 or 64) of the target operating system.
member.remarks:
All (s) must be compatible with this value. Note that 64 bit systems can run 32 bit assemblies.
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: Y

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateBehavior
member.summary: Controls how add-in updates are processed on a client machine.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateBehavior.Mode
member.summary: Specifies if the update is required and if so, how update notifications should be displayed to the client.
member.remarks:
If then the update will be processed regardless if the (of the ) was incremented or not. When is set to true updates will display a non-cancellable dialog to the client that notifies them of a pending update. If , then, updates can be deferred until a later time.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateBehavior.RequiresRestart
member.summary: Specifies whether the Excel Application shoud be restarted for the add-in update to take place.
member.remarks:
This must be set to "true" for the following types of add-ins: 1. Add-ins that use any of the COM features (e.g. Ribbon, CTP, RTD, etc.) 2. Add-ins that reference external assemblies. See for more information.
If the add-in is installed on the client's instance of Excel, Excel must be restarted regardless of the value of this property.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateBehavior.RemoveDeprecatedVersion
member.summary: Idicates if the old version should be removed (deleted) from the client.
member.remarks:
If true, the removal/deletion of the previously deployed version of the add-in would (including all of its supporting files) will be performed once the update is complete.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateBehavior.NotifyClient
member.summary: Specifies whether or not update notifications should be displayed to the client.
member.remarks:
If is set to true, then this property will be ignored and the client will be notified regardless.
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateBehavior.DoInRealTime
member.summary: Specifies whether the updates are pushed to the client machine in realtime.
member.remarks:
When set to true, updates will be pushed to the client as they occur on the remote host. This only applies to remote hosts of type equal to
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateBehavior.Expiration
member.summary: Represents how old the current update can become before the application will perform the next update check.
member.remarks:
If is set to true, then the value of this property will be ignored. Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: N

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateMode
member.summary: Represents how update notifications are displayed to the client.

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateExpiration
member.summary: Represents how old the current update can become before the application will perform the next update check.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateExpiration.Description
member.summary: Represents a human-readable description of an .

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateExpiration.MaximumAge
member.summary: Identifies how old the current update should become before the application performs an update check. The unit of time is determined by the .
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateExpiration.UnitOfTime
member.summary: Identifies the unit of time for the . Valid units are hours, days, and weeks.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Attribute
Xml Required: Y

member.name: T:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo
member.summary: Represents information regarding an update coming from a remote .

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.AvailableVersion
member.summary: The version of the incoming update.
member.remarks: The listed in the manifest on the remote .

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.MinimumRequiredVersion
member.summary: Specifies the minimum version of the application that can run on the client.
member.remarks: This is used to determine if an incoming update is mandatory.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.DeployedVersion
member.summary: The version currently deployed on the client.
member.remarks: The listed in the manifest on the client machine.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.UpdateAvailable
member.summary: Indicates whether an update exists on the remote

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.IsMandatoryUpdate
member.summary: Indicates whether or not to the incoming update is mandatory.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.IsRestartRequired
member.summary: Indicates whether or not to the incoming update requires a resart of Excel.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.Size
member.summary: Specifies the toal size (in bytes) of all files in the incoming update.

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.LastChecked
member.summary: The last time an update check was performed.
member.remarks:
Xml Node Type: Element
Xml Required: Y

member.name: P:XLAutoDeploy.Mage.UpdateQueryInfo.FirstNotified
member.summary: The first time a user was notified that an update was avaliable.
member.remarks:
